title: Gyoza Sauce
ingredients: ⅓ cup thinly sliced green onions
½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
½ teaspoon minced fresh ginger root
method: Step 2: Whisk together rice vinegar, soy sauce, green onions, garlic, sesame oil, red pepper flakes, and ginger in a bowl.
Step 3: Let sit for 15 minutes before serving.
Step 4: Store covered in the refrigerator for up to 1 week. Enjoy!
